choices: Not another day at the office???
1.content:
Your name is Matt and you're a graduate student and an intern at the office of recently elected Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. It's great experience and a good job to have since-because of her socialist ideas-she pays all interns $15 which mean that you can survive off this salary while you're in graduate school. You've always secretly thought in addition to being a great boss-that Alexandria was also very cute and harbor a major crush on her.

However-especially because of her recent big win in the midterm election-you know that she is way out of your league and barely knows who you are and are almost certain that she couldn't reciprocate your feelings about her. But little do you realize that that all about to change very soon......

You really don't want to lose this job since you like both experience you're getting working at Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez office and believe in the political causes that she's promoting as well. Even though you're only an intern-you're still the only person in this office with both a educational background on economics and political science and I had to forward the speech to Ms. Cortez just a few minute ago even it's not ready!" "Do you realize how Fox news and other conservative media are scrutinizing every word we say which is why we can't afford any mistakes like this!!!" she yells. "I'm afraid this incident is going to require some very serious action on my part".

13.content:
My name is Jack, and I’m an intern for Republican Congressman Graham. One afternoon, I was called into the Senator's chambers and offered the most bizarre, absurd assignment you could ever imagine. First, they wanted to shrink me down to the size of a worm. Okay? And THEN find a way to secretly get me into contact with Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in order to spy for Congressman Graham, and see what I could dig up on her.

There was a pregnant pause in the room while I waited for them to share the punchline. They told me that they were quite serious, and in possession of a prototype shrinking machine. It takes several minutes for the process to complete, and cannot be undone until I’m placed back into the machine again. Then, they showed a small example, placing an office chair into the contraption. Since it was an inanimate object, it only took about a minute to shrink it down to thimble size.

I was still trying to figure out if this was some strange test from my superiors, and I had no idea if I was supposed to just riff along with them or what? The whole thing still seemed patently impossible (despite what I’d seen with my very eyes), and I wondered if it was all some magic trick – and the real chair was whisked behind a door or something (rather than actually being shrunk).

They assured me they were quite serious and that – off the record – they felt that she might have some connection to the neighbor who accosted Senator Graham at his home last year. They told me it was up to me to find that dirt, or any other sordid things I could uncover about the fiery Latina Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. They further explained that, although my assignment would always have to be kept secret, I would be doing a heroic job in the name of Capitalism and the American Way.

They explained that - once small - my body would be able to endure a lot more punishment in comparable scale to what my 5’7 body could currently withstand, and that I could do small leaps that would be similarly impossible to achieve per scale for my current size.

The plan was to secretly pass me along through either direct or indirect channels to the body or possessions of Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in one of the following manner:

132.content:
The plan was for me to infiltrate the postal mail for Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. Naturally, any incoming mail for all Congress must pass inspection. I was able to simply curl up among the foam packing peanuts in a small gift for the incoming Congresswoman from her colleagues at Senator Graham’s offices.

Most of my day was spent waiting, trapped inside the small package with little air. At first, I was likely inside the congresswoman’s Washington mail slot, but at some point, I could feel the package being carried before again sitting. This time for a long time.

I fell asleep among the packing peanuts for who knows how long before I suddenly felt the package being lifted and again carried somewhere. Once there, I could feel the mail being given from one set of hands to another, and then set down again.

Outside, I could hear the unmistakable voice of Ocasio-Cortez, though muffled still ensconced inside the gift package. And then the box was rising up again, and I knew it was probably “go-time”. A sudden slash of a razor blade through the package tape expertly opened the gift from Senator Graham: A small bottle of expensive perfume.

I was tucked in among the package peanuts below the perfume, so was able to avoid detection while the now booming voice of the Congresswoman remarked on the gift to the office lackey who was giving the Latina bombshell a worshipful pedicure. He seemed afraid to even venture a gaze up from the foot at the statuesque beauty who grinded her heel into the young man’s groin while his hands fervently caressed and massaged the Congresswoman’s cocoa colored feet. “Oh, look Matt: A small gesture of welcome from those evil old white men in Senator Graham’s office.”

“Perhaps they want to curry favor with you, my Goddess?”, ventured Matt.

“DID I SAY STOP LICKING, CAPITALIST DOG!”, Ocasio-Cortez suddenly screamed, causing a visible shiver to run down poor Matt’s young spine, “N-No, great and powerful Goddess. I-‘m so sorry! Please forgive your humble servant!”

I’m not going to lie: she scared the hell out of me too with her sudden outburst, but apparently young Matt was accustomed to this sort of treatment after hours just the two of them in the Congresswoman’s office. Why, I’d only just arrived inside and already was finding out all sorts of juicy information about the real Ocasio-Cortez!

As the Congresswoman slightly hiked up her already tight skirt in her leather lounge chair, she glared intently down her sleek leg at the boyish office underling she already had at her beck and call. I knew he didn’t dare look up at her, so I took the opportunity while they were both distracted to sneak my way:
132.title: Through Her Mailbox

choices: You forgot to bring me lunch, Matt!
Give me a better foot rub (your life depends on it)
1323.content:
"You know Matt" said the Congresswoman looking in a wolfish manner at her abused intern. "I find it suspicious that we received a gift from Congressman Graham given that all he does is normally try to sabotage my office and the bills that we put forward on the House floor. In fact-I've heard rumor that there is some kind of plot by him and other Republican Congress members to plant a spy in this office to bring me down!" she exclaimed.

"But, Ms. Cortez" Matt interjected "You've personally interviewed and verified every member of your staff including myself-surely you are not implying that one of us could be the guilty party?"

She snickered and got up from her chair walking over to a cabinet behind her desk. "Of course not, Matt" she laughed "I know my staff is loyal-most of all yourself. In fact, I know that you devoted your whole life to this job when you moved from the shithole town that you're from to work here. I also know that you live alone in your tiny apartment here and nobody except myself would know if something were to happen to you. It would almost be like you disappeared from this world entirely" she said giving an especially insidious sneer to her intern.

She then opened the cabinet to reveal a very familiar looking machine inside it. When you laid eyes on it-you froze in fear realizing exactly what the machine was. Matt, however, was completely oblivious and stood up and walked over to it. "Uh-ok-what's this-and what does this have to do Republicans efforts to sabotage us" he asked.

She grinned at him and said "This, my friend, is a shrinking machine-it can, in only a matter of minutes, shrink a person to say the size of potato chip or a piece of candy" she said licking her lips a little as she explained it to him. "I have it on good authority that Republicans have used this machine to implant a tiny spy somewhere in this building-perhaps, even in this very ROOM." she exclaimed creating a sonic boom to your tiny terrified ears.

"Really-that unbelievable! Matt yelled but then paused and said "So-wait-why do you have this machine here then"

"Why to show our enemy that we can play their game just as well as they can" she said and then looked intently at Matt "AND-to show give them a demonstration of what will happen to that spy when I uncover him/her"

With that said, she slammed a large black button on top of the machine shooting a weird purple light at Matt and in a matter of seconds he had shrank to your minuscule size and landed, completely naked-on Cortez's desk.

The young Congresswoman walked over and sat down at the desk picking up her tiny, helpless intern into her hand and then burst at laughing saying to him...

With that Matt screamed and ran off the giantess' hand making the life threatening jump from her hand back onto the desk and breaking one of his legs on the landing. He yelped in pain, but upon seeing the giant hand descending on him once again starting running for the edge of the desk. He catapulted off the desk just in time before being grabbed and landed on the soft thigh of the giant girl. He quickly began to slide down her immense smooth leg towards his escape hope on the floor. He was almost to her shoe when the giant hand again made an attempt for him-this time succeeding and grabbing the tiny intern back firmly into her clutches.

"Haha-oh Matt-you were never this much fun back when you used to work for me" she giggled and brought the tiny man back up to her large lips "maybe if you had been more fun-I would have had a harder time doing this, but you've always been expendable which is why now I think you need to be my new lunch"

Despite his screams she began slowly licking the intern with her giant tongue drenching him in saliva and then began sucking on the top half of his body like a lollipop. You could occasionally her Matt's muffed screams, but only a few of them every once and awhile. Eventually she popped Matt's whole body into her mouth and began sucking on him like a jawbreaker. At one point you saw Matt's head poke at from her lips and attempt to scream but the giant tongues emerged and pushed him back in. You watched in abject horror for several minutes before hearing a pronounced gulping sound and saw the giant girl then rubbing her stomach.

"Mmmmmmm-thank for that tasty treat, Matt" she giggled "I know it will take you at least a few more minutes to digest and die and wouldn't want you to be alone in your final moments before becoming my poop-so I guess I'll just have to find you some company!"

The giantess stood up and begun looking around the room-several times glancing in your direction-but not taking notice of you while doing this. "Well-my little Republican spy-I hope you enjoyed that little spectacle because it's a foretaste of what I have in store for you when I find you. Matt was the appetizer but now I'm ready for the main course!" she said and begun searching the room for you.

132311.content:
Though you're terrified at the sight that you just beheld-you know that you cannot be deterred from your mission for Congressman Graham and the Republican Party so you decide to press on. As you see the booming giantess stomping around her office looking for you-you notice that her purse is lying knocked over from all of the commotion that just took place and realize that this is your chance. When Alexandria walks over to the other side of the room, you make a dash for her purse-sprinting with everything that you're worth until you finally reach the opened zipper at the top of the bag. You climb in hiding close to the bottom under her phone and pocket book nestling into a Kleenex package.

After what couldn't have been more than 10 minutes-you suddenly feel the purse pulled up into motion and all the items inside, including you being rocked around inside it. You see a giant tube of lipstick rolling towards you, but luckily the Kleenexes provide some padding and protection. "Whatever-fine-I'll sniff out the little spy later" you hear a booming voice resound "for now-I've got much bigger fish to fry" she says and with that she walks out of the office carrying you alongside in her handbag.
132311.title: Still must continue the mission-at any cost

1323111.content:
(Disclaimer: I know that this isn't how a US House bill is voted on or passed into law, but this is a fictional story and if you want to see the former-I suggest you watch CSPAN or something)

You feel the rumbling and shaking of the giantess' purse continue for what must have been about 20 minutes. Suddenly the motion stops and you can tell that she's set the purse on the ground. Cautiously-you peer up and are shocked when you look around to realize that you are currently on the House Floor of Congress and are surrounded by titanic men and women of the US Congress. You are just beginning to take in the amazing sight when suddenly a familiar face walks up to Ms Cortez and you realize that it's none other than Senator Graham!

"Hello, Ms. Cortez" he says in a polite but begrudging manner "I hope that you got the gift basket that I sent to you earlier". She looked at him with a smirking expression and replied "I did-thank so much, but don't expect it to impact how I vote on this upcoming bill" she said with a stone cold look of determination on her face. With that-the two political enemies nodded to each other and parted ways. But before Senator Graham departed-he stopped and peered down in your direction as if he were looking at something when suddenly he gasped and you realized that the thing he was looking at was you. He pursed his lips quickly looked away when you waved at him-but it was clear that he had seen you and seemed somewhat uneasy about your current location.

After a few minutes, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi got up to the podium and spoke "Now that it is time to vote, my fellow elected member of Congress-it's time to pass the New Green Deal that will help bring us into the 21st century with the rest of the world" she exclaimed. After that-you heard a some cheers and some jeers coming from the Congressional body and decided that it was best to hunker back down into Ms. Cortez's purse for at least awhile.
1323111.title: To the House floor

13231111.content:
After what must have been an hour, you feel shaking and rumbling and realize that the purse is back in motion again and after some time of this-you can feel the bag has been set on the floor again. You peer up out of the bag and see that you're back in Ms Cortez's office; however, the Congresswoman herself is nowhere to be seen. You take advantage of the opportunity to exit the purse and try to find a new hiding place within her office. Suddenly, though, you here thunderous footsteps approaching and immediately take refuge behind a leg of her desk.

When the door opens-you stunned to seen none other than Ivanka and Eric Trump and they both appear to be looking for something. "Hurry Eric!" Ivanka barked "Senator Graham said that our spy's location could have possibly been compromised and we need to get him out of here before he's discovered!" With that the two set about searching through the office looking around her desk and even in your former hiding spot of her handbag clearing in search for something small."

Realizing that this was your chance you jumped out from behind the desk leg, waving and screaming at your max volume hoping that your cries wouldn't got unnoticed by their giant ears. Suddenly you felt the ground shake and saw Ivanka's mega-sized high heel land mere inches away from your tiny body. She squinted in your direction but didn't seem to see you.

"Did you find him" Eric asked coming over near his sister. "No-I just thought I heard some kind of squeaking or something coming from this direction. She continued to squint in you direction when suddenly her giant eyes got even bigger. "Oh my gosh, Eric-there he is" she gasped. She the carefully kneeled down to your level and extended her giant hand in front of you. "Senator Graham told us that you might be in danger so we're here to break you out" she said with a slight smile in her beautiful face. "You must hurry too-I think Congresswoman Cortez will be back from dinner any minute now and we must leave while we still can.

Not needing any encouragement-you immediately hopped onto the giantess enormous soft hand and then saw your surroundings darken as it encapsulated you. You then felt a familiar rumbling and shaking as you could tell that she was now hastily walking out of the office building.

You then proceed to tell her your story about how you hadn't actually been found by Ms. Cortez, but how she had learned of the Republican plot somehow and how then she had demonstrated her knowledge of this by making an example of an unfortunate intern in her office.

Ivanka listened intently to your story and was clearly, by the look on her face, quite taken aback by it. She then let our a sigh of relief and said "Wow! That's truly remarkable that she not only knows of our plans but would even do that to one of her own just to set an example-yeah, I'd say your really lucky to still be alive right now, little guy!" she laughed.

You open your eyes wondering what happened. Your heads pounding, and you don't recognize your surroundings. Everything's pretty dark and your the ground is swaying all below you.
